document_data.mainbody:
Murtlen was an unhappy commoner from the City of Coin, Athkatla, in the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
Murtlen was a fair-skinned human male with red hair.
In the , Murtlen could be found shopping in Athkatlas Center District, in Waukeens Promenade. He frequented shops and stalls opened on the elevated wooden walkways, including stalls run by Maheer yn Kadar el Saddith and Quataris. Murtlen ranted at passersby folk about them surely having been cheated by these merchants and accused their goods of being shoddy and of poor quality.
